name: get_trims_by_generation_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_specs.
Tool description: Fast, simple and reliable API to retrieve car data. Contains data on almost all car manufacturers and models, updated regularly.
API description: Returns a list of all trims (engine types) available for a given generation of a car model.

generationid.description: The ID of the generation for which to retrieve trims.
